item.title: The AI mirror: When technology reflects our deepest loneliness - Fast Company
item.description:
A Fast Company article explores the paradoxical relationship between AI companions and human loneliness, highlighting how technology designed to connect can ironically exacerbate feelings of isolation and unmet emotional needs.
Source: Google News Tech
